pullrequest.title: Add train instance specific random number generation

content.raw: Can you please be consistent about `random_state` versus `random_generator`? Pick one (perhaps `random_state` or even `rand_state` since it matches the class name). And I would just use `random_seed` or `rand_seed` instead of `random_generator_seed`.
content.html: Can you please be consistent about random_state versus random_generator? Pick one (perhaps random_state or even rand_state since it matches the class name). And I would just use random_seed or rand_seed instead of random_generator_seed.
